pr_title: Match query to respect lenient flag

timeline.message:
Match query to respect lenient flag

A recent change introduced throwing exception when a match query is executed against a field that does not support text search. The query would fail anyways, only at a later stage. The problem though is that the lenient flag needs to be taken into account.
